name: Split Spirit
description:
WARNING : Default Volume Is 0. If You Want Music, You Need To Open It From Options Menu.

Controls :

W or Up Arrow : Jump

A or Left Arrow : Move Left

D or Right Arrow : Move Right

Space : Interact With Objects

Story :

One Day, A Kid Was Wandering Around His House. Suddenly, He Saw A Secret Cave Entrance With Some Buttons. He Headed Into Depth Of The Cave. He Found A Weird Floating Crystal On An Ancient Stone. When He Attempted To Take The Crystal, His Spirit Split By The Crystal.

Theme: Two

Crystal Split Your Spirit Into Two. You Must Control Your Two Spirit At The Same Time And Try To Put Together Your Spirits By Solving Puzzles.

Assets:

Glitch Effect Made By Staffantan https://github.com/staffantan/unityglitch

All Musics In The Game Made By Joshua McLean http://mrjoshuamclean.com/royalty-free-music/

OverWorld Tiles And Trees Are Premade By Us

Rest Of Assets Are Made By Us And During The Game Jam
